memories.title: Our First Date
memories.description: The day we met and I knew you were special. Your smile lit up the whole room.

memories.title: Beach Day
memories.description: Walking on the beach at sunset, holding hands and talking for hours.

memories.title: Your Birthday
memories.description: Celebrating you and making sure you felt as special as you make me feel every day.

dreams.title: Paris Together
dreams.description: Walking through the streets of Paris, visiting the Eiffel Tower, and eating croissants at a cute cafÃ©.

dreams.title: Our Home
dreams.description: Creating a cozy home together where we can build our future and make countless memories.

dreams.title: Learn to Dance
dreams.description: Taking dance lessons together and laughing at our clumsy attempts.

dreams.title: Road Trip
dreams.description: A spontaneous road trip with no plans, just us and the open road.

dreams.title: Cook Together
dreams.description: Having weekly cooking dates where we try new recipes and make a mess in the kitchen.

dreams.title: Grow Old Together
dreams.description: Being by each other's side through everything life brings us, forever and always.
